DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy low risk criterion lymph node metastasis , determine KGOG-2014 retrospective study , woman endometrial cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Prospective , Observational Study Low-risk Criteria Node Metastasis Endometrial Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: The Korean Gynecologic Oncology Group ( KGOG ) undertake multi-center retrospective study develop preoperative prediction model lymph node metastasis endometrial cancer ( KGOG-2014 ) . This retrospective multi-center study show accurate identification low-risk group lymph node metastasis among patient endometrial cancer achieve new criterion use preoperative MRI serum CA-125 assay . In study , serum CA125 level three MRI parameter ( deep myometrial invasion , lymph node enlargement , extension beyond uterine corpus ) find independent risk factor nodal metastasis . Based success KGOG-2014 , Korean Gynecologic Oncology Group initiate prospective , multi-center observational study validate prior prediction model .
DOC.criteria: Patients histologic diagnosis endometrial cancer surgical staging . Patients preoperative magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ) serum CA125 within 4 week surgical staging . Patients underwent adequate systemic lymph node dissection surgical staging . Patients histologic feature suggest sarcoma squamous cell carcinoma
